articles.description: Australian fighter George Kambosos is comprehensively beaten by IBF super lightweight champion Richardson Hitchins in Madison Square Garden, after Aussie heavyweight claims major scalp.

Australian fighter George Kambosos has been comprehensively beaten by IBF super lightweight champion Richardson Hitchins in Madison Square Garden.

articles.title: 7 killed in helicopter crash in Uttarakhand, chopper services shut
articles.description: A helicopter belonging to Aryan Aviation, carrying 7 people, flying from Guptkashi to Kedarnath Dham crashed in the jungles of Gaurikund.
articles.content: A helicopter belonging to Aryan Aviation, flying from Kedarnath Dham to Guptkashi, has crashed in the jungles of Gaurikund, leading to the deaths of 7 people, including the pilot. Following the crash, helicopter services operating in the Char Dham re... [1903 chars]

articles.title: Mpox tally in Aurora rises, no fatalities reported
articles.description:
The number of monkeypox cases in Aurora province has risen to 17.
According to the Provincial Epidemiology and Surveillance Unit (PESU) of Aurora, the cases were recorded from January 1 to June 14, 2025.
articles.content:
